column1: We need a champion for workers with the experience to get the job done in the Senate. That’s the Doug I know.  Doug’s Trump-endorsed opponent supports dismantling the #AffordableCareAct & said he “wouldn’t have a clue” how to handle the coronavirus.   Chip in if you can. - SB https://t.co/oKX6SZOKqm

More lies from President Trump to distract from his coronavirus failures. Trump has caved to China over and over -- his deal did nothing for Ohio steel factories and did nothing to stop corporations from sending our jobs to China. - SB https://t.co/G88thfgeEv
Dr. Amy Acton played a crucial role in leading our state’s response to the coronavirus pandemic. Her expertise and commitment helped protect the health & safety of so many Ohioans.

The USPS needs aid to protect 600000 postal workers' jobs & execute vote-by-mail efforts this fall so we can prevent the spread of the coronavirus.  Sign on & demand the Trump Administration & Congress take action to save the USPS & expand voting by mail.https://t.co/lzqEwenwqf

On this #WorkersMemorialDay the fight for the #DignityofWork is more important than ever. Today my thoughts are with the families who've lost loved ones to COVID-19. We must do more to protect all workers. - SB
TONIGHT @ 8 p.m. ET Sherrod will join @StaceyAbrams @BeaHeroTeam & @IndivisibleTeam for a teleconference about the response to COVID-19. Click here to register >> https://t.co/IK1TvaI4iD
